item.title: Dragon Mace - Fix for Most Clients
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

This is usually a dragon head, on bluurs, and delta clients. I just dumped it from a 474.
Its been released before, but i have seen requests on this one.

if (i == 1434) { //dragon mace class8.anInt174 = 2391; class8.anInt181 = 1440; class8.anInt190 = 348; class8.anInt198 = 1388; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -13; class8.anInt194 = 13; class8.anInt165 = 493; class8.anInt200 = 493; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aByteArray178 = "A spiky mace.".getBytes(); }
